content: **crochet sweater scarf pattern mirabilis design worsted weight ** wrap yourself in comfort and style with the mirabilis crochet sweater scarf this cozy crochet pattern combines the elegance of a wrap with the wearability of a sweater giving you a versatile accessory that you can style in countless ways made with worsted weight yarn this sweater scarf features a simple textured stitch repeat that looks stunning while being enjoyable to crochet the result is a gloriously soft and comfortable piece that you ll reach for again and again throughout the colder months whether you re layering it over a formal outfit keeping warm during everyday wear or adding a chic handmade piece to your wardrobe the mirabilis sweater scarf is endlessly versatile this is a pdf crochet pattern for the mirabilis puff sweater scarf it is crocheted using us yo slip_stitch single_crochet and half_double_crochet stitches *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not a finished product **pattern features ** sizes included xs/s/m l/xl/2xl 3xl/4xl/5xl to fit chest 30 -62 skill level intermediate stitch half_double_crochet single_crochet and yarn over slip stitches instant pdf download full video tutorial to support written pattern if you are a visual learner us crochet terms uk stitch conversion chart **why you ll love this pattern ** ✨ a great layering piece that transitions from casual to formal wear ✨ soft warm and practical for winter while still looking chic ✨ perfect for gifting or treating yourself with a timeless handmade accessory ✨ inclusive sizing from xs through 5xl ✨detailed instructions 10 page pdf in us crochet terms for clear easy-to-follow guidance **materials needed ** category 4 worsted weight yarn 100% acrylic -
